_meta.note: Canonical item definitions used by rooms and mechanics. 'sellable' items include an optional sell_value for shops.

Extra Die.desc: Permanently adds one more die to your dice pool. Maximum 5 dice.

Lucky Chip.desc: Increases crit chance by 5% for one fight.

Weighted Die.desc: Increases crit chance by 3% for one fight.

Tempered Rivet.desc: Better vs. constructs; model as +2 generic.

Thimble Charm.desc: Steady hands: small crit boost this combat.

Drum Mallet.desc: War beat: larger crit boost this combat.

Goggles.desc: Reduce shard/glass hazards for a floor.

Ear Pad.desc: Reduce sound hazards for a floor.

Returned Name.desc: Remove negative statuses and steady resolve.

Writ of Pardon.desc: Escape a punishment or death once.

Verdict Seal.desc: Escape a punishment or death once.

Lockpick Kit.desc: Unlock a locked container. Consumed on use.

Quill Knife.desc: Precise cut to bypass a trap once.

Honey Jar.desc: Sweet honey in a small jar.

Bandages.desc: Clean cloth strips for dressing wounds. Less potent than potions but reliable.

Weapon Repair Kit.desc: Restore 40% durability to a weapon or repair a broken weapon.

Armor Repair Kit.desc: Restore 40% durability to armor or repair broken armor.
